data.title: Matilda Tristram on LinkedIn: The Adventures of Abney & Teal
data.meta_description: One of the first episodes of kids' TV I ever wrote, for Abney and Teal. I still love this show so much. The look of the series was inspired by Yuri Norstein'sâ€¦
data.text:
Ever created a video and found out afterwards it looked like something was "floating" around your head? Or know someone who has married the same person twice? Did it work out...or did their fortune cookie tell the truth? And...did you see my spider pictures (tarantula and a sun spider came to my house to "visit")? I share the story in this episode.

In this episode of CFK, my guest is actually my younger brother, Peres Felix Akponwei. Our conversation was on pressing through trials - an experience we will go through in life https://lnkd.in/eqAA9Ujs
